data.text: @harbottlesmythe @ricardominyardo @TracyCollins13 @SikotiHamiltonR It maybe better but it’s actually a job no one should want. You get all the grief, a little pot of money and one vote equal to every other councillor
@SikotiHamiltonR Dunno if you have DMs open but sure, although I'm stupid busy right at the moment
@ricardominyardo @TracyCollins13 @SikotiHamiltonR I’m with you there Richard, it’s better

@huhanahickey @Nic18111 @JoelSteedman Wouldn't it be wonderful to see a revival of Kirk's ohu scheme. And how can one not admire the press conference he called in DC to denounce the overthrow of Allende.

@notes_south @JoelSteedman @Hoareytwits wrote an absolutely essential thesis about NZers who opposed the building of our empire in the Pacific. It's a text that badly needs to be published, because it helps break down the stereotype of fin de siecle Pakeha as overwhelmingly racist.
@SikotiHamiltonR @JoelSteedman As it was nearly every man of his age. It makes those who stood against the current shine ever brighter.
